com.ben12.infxnity.control.text

Class MaskBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ben12.infxnity.control.text.MaskBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<MaskTextFilter.MaskCharacter[]>

    public class MaskBuilder
extends Object
implements Builder<MaskTextFilter.MaskCharacter[]>
    Mask builder use to create a mask for MaskTextFilter.
    Author:
    Beno√Æt Moreau (ben.12)
